citeinfo.origin: Jill Sanchez, Broomfield GIS Division, GIS Specialist
citeinfo.title: Broomfield County, Colorado land parcels, 2009

descript.abstract: Land parcels in Broomfield County, Colorado, 2009. These data were taken from The City and County of Broomfield GIS database layers and the Broomfield Assessor database.

idinfo.useconst: The City and County of Broomfield has made every effort to ensure the accuracy of its data. Use of this information is the sole responsibility of the user and The City and County of Broomfield assumes no liability associated with the use or misuse of this information. Sale or reproduction of this information is prohibited without the express written consent from the City and County of Broomfield. Data are licensed to Princeton University-affiliated persons only.

attrvai.attrvae: Zoning is based on a spatial join with the zoning layer. However, the zoning layer does not follow parcel boundaries in all cases and may actually split a parcel.
